mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from actual_sales
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into actual_sales (ID, ACTUAL_YEAR, FULL_CODE, BP_CODE, BP_NAME, CATEGORY, BRAND, PP_CODE, PP_NAME, BG, PC_CODE, PC_NAME, JAN, FEB, MAR, APR, MAY, JUN, JUL, AUG, SEP, OCT, NOV, DECE, CREATE_BY, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{actualYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fullCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bpCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bpName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ppCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ppName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pcCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pcName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{feb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{apr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{may,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jun,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jul,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aug,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sep,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oct,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nov,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dece,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
